alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 03 at 2:01AM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY SUNDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 421... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY SUNDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 421... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through early Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 421. * WIND...West to northwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...8 to 12 percent. * HAINES...6. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop may spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
